backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing clients, tasks, assignees, and user profiles with per-caller storage and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping reliability/stability features to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH-based light/dark theme tokens and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div, favicon, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, defensive initialization, URL cleanup deferral, and top-level error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog for uploading assignees via CSV with parsing, validation, error handling, and bulk create mutation.
Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting assignees with form validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing screen for signed-out users with Internet Identity login and feature overview cards.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: CSV-based bulk client upload dialog that parses, validates, and submits multiple client records.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting individual clients with validation and mutation logic.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: Error boundary capturing startup errors and displaying a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: Fallback UI prompting the user to reload the page after an app startup error.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, header, user menu, and responsive mobile sidebar.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog for bulk editing selected tasks, collecting optional field updates and submitting them via bulkUpdateTasks.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog for uploading tasks from CSV, validating parsed rows, previewing them, and submitting bulk creation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Read‑only task details display component showing status, dates, financials, and optional fields.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Form dialog for creating or editing a single task, handling all editable task fields and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Inline status selector allowing quick task status updates using updateTask.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses and helpers for normalizing, validating, and displaying status values.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk‑managing assignees through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React-query hooks for CRUD and bulk operations on clients via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React-query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and bulk operations on tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the authenticated user's profile using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeferredUrlCleanup: Runs deferred URL cleanup after component mount using a timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated utilities for parsing and encoding legacy client data structures.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: UI page for listing, searching, editing, and bulk deleting assignees with dialogs and filtering.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single client's details, loads related tasks, computes task stats, and provides edit and task creation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists all clients with search, selection, bulk deletion, and dialogs for adding or bulk uploading clients.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows overall task metrics, revenue stats, upcoming and overdue tasks, with navigation into filtered task views.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Displays and filters all tasks with search, sorting, bulk actions, editing, export, and upload capabilities.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates and parses CSV templates for assignee bulk upload with basic validation and row conversion.
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Generates and parses client CSV upload templates, validating required fields and mapping rows to backend format.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Provides utilities to compute task statistics, revenue by category, and status counts for analytics.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Parses and validates task CSV files, generates templates, and converts date/number fields while collecting errors. Includes CSV line parsing and optional-field handling for bulk task upload.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Provides formatting helpers for task dates, currency, and optional text with a placeholder fallback. Ensures consistent display in UI components.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Converts tasks into Excel-friendly rows, loads SheetJS from CDN, and exports formatted task data to a downloadable .xlsx file. Handles date and currency formatting and column sizing.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Implements sortable task lists with configurable fields and directions using safe comparisons for strings, numbers, and bigint timestamps. Includes labeling and status-display normalization.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage. Supports cleanup of sensitive parameters from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending typography, colors, radius, shadows, animations, and container settings. Enables plugins and defines a custom theme for the app.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s state, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features. Used for tracking requirements and build planning.
